word:
Chap. 24 - Qualifications for Successful Christian Service

                       Efficiency 

     Listlessness and inefficiency are not piety. When we realize that we are working for God, we shall have a higher sense than we have ever had before of the sacredness of spiritual service. This realization will put life and vigilance and persevering energy into the discharge of every duty.-- Testimonies, vol. 9, p. 150.
